newsitem.title: USA: BEA Income Fund sets rights offering.
newsitem.headline: BEA Income Fund sets rights offering.

text.p: BEA Income Fund Inc said its board of directors had approved a rights offering for the company's shareholders.

The company said in a statement late on Thursday that for every three shares, a shareholder will have the right to purchase one more share. Shareholders of record will be entitled to subscribe pursuant to an over-subscription privilege.
The record date for the offering and an estimated subscription price will be determined on or about the effective date of the Fund's registration statement.
The Fund has about 24.38 million shares outstanding.
